name: Woocommerce Easy View
author: hermann Zossou

sections.description:
Demos

  • Demo

Overview

Popup View are a powerful marketing weapon which allows you to drive customer loyalty. Woocommerce Easy View is a powerful extension which letsnmanage shop view like a pro

Woocommerce Easy View is built using WordPress best pratices both on the front and the back end.The results in an efficient,robust and intuitive plugin.It’s works with any theme,including the default WordPress themes and the last Woocommerce version.

View planning

  • Start date of showing products view
  • End date of showing product view

View condition

  • Customer role:Apply a view if the customer has a specific role.
  • Authors:Following a specific author
  • Items name/ID:Make a view by selection of products
  • Customer:Apply view for specified customer

Arbitrary section 1
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place <?php do_action('plugin_name_hook'); ?> in your templates
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place <?php do_action('plugin_name_hook'); ?> in your templates

A question that someone might have

An answer to that question.
